column1: margaret ingle hill| hill margaret i. age 87 of andersonville
column2: went home to be with her lord on thursday june 11
column3: 2015. she was of the baptist faith
column5: and was a member of the fountain city sportsman club. preceded in death by parents john and irene ingle
column6: husband harold hill and sister elizabeth overton. she is survived by sons and daughters-in-law
column8: stephen and nancy underwood; granddaughters jamie underwood
column9: stephanie benko and her husband mark
column10: courtnay underwood; great granddaughters sarah and anna benko. the family will receive friends 5:00 to 6:00 p. m. sunday at rose mortuary broadway chapel with funeral services at 6:00 p. m. family and friends will meet at the main entrance to woodlawn cemetery 1:15 p. m. monday for interment service at 1:30 p. m. the online obituary may be viewed and condolences made at www. rosemortuary. com upcoming events. interment jun 15. 1:30 pm woodlawn cemetery4500 woodlawn pike. knoxville
